summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 12th Avenue North and 13th Avenue North, each from East Boston Street to Miller Street; and Miller Street, from 11th Avenue North to the east line of Lovegren's Addition to the City of Seattle; East Lynn Street from 11th Avenue North to the east margin of 13th Avenue North; and Emmons Place, from East Boston Street to East Lynn Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 888 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
